title: 2 chests for free?
body: I logged on today, and went into my loot section, and saw that i had 2 chests and 2 keys added into my inventory. Not sure how this happened, but i did change my name yesterday, so i'm not sure if that had anything to do with it.

replies.body: Must be your calling, it's in your name.  :P You have a ticket open that should should offer more details.  Feel free to hit up your specialist if you have any questions or concerns!
